data.name: Corekaburra
data.description: Program to find core gene consensus synteny, hotspots between these, and construct spatially aware multiple sequence alignments of core genes

evidence: "Corekaburra looks at the gene synteny across genomes used to build a pan-genome..." (domain-specific genomic analysis tool, run as a program)
"Corekaburra fits into the existing frameworks of bioinformatics pipelines for pan-genomes as a downstream analysis tool." (used as an analysis application in research workflows)

"Corekaburra is written in Python 3.9, and can be installed via pip and conda. A Docker container is also available.

## Conda install
```conda install -c bioconda -c conda-forge corekaburra```

## pip
```pip install corekaburra```" (distribution via PyPI and conda/bioconda)
